name: Extraction!
description:
You play as a guy in robotic armour who is attempting to steal access codes from a warehouse in order to help his team have the upper hand in battle! You must attempt to obtain the codes and escape by hacking into terminals to open doors and avoid the guards, guard dogs and security cameras in the process.

If you can successfully escape with the codes you win!

This game was created in less than 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 37 Game Jam event!
